note_title: Changes in Inventories of Finished Goods
summation_rule: Calculate net change as: Opening Inventories (beginning) minus Closing Inventories (end). Closing inventories are assets with debit balances (positive). Opening inventories are set to zero for current period. Final change = Opening - Closing.

output_format.label: **Inventories at the end of the period**
**Inventories at the beginning of the period**

additional_instructions: This note shows changes in inventory levels. Closing inventories (end of period) are fetched from trial balance by mapping to respective minor categories and aggregated algebraically. Opening inventories (beginning of period) are shown as zero (0) as no prior period data is available. Calculate subtotals for both sections and show net change. Always generate this note.
